mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_qna_answer (qna_no, user_id, subject, content) VALUES (#{qnaNo}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content});
mapper.select: select b.answer_no, b.qna_no, b.user_id, b.subject, b.content, b.register_time, m.user_name from board_qna_answer b, members m where b.user_id = m.user_id and b.qna_no = #{qnaNo} order by b.answer_no desc limit 1
